title: Chemical composition and antioxidant properties of native Ecuadorian fruits: Rubus glabratus Kunth, Vaccinium floribundum Kunth, and Opuntia soederstromiana
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Raúl D. Monge-Sevilla, Lenys Fernández, Patricio J. Espinoza-Montero, Carlos Méndez-Durazno, Pablo A. Cisneros-Pérez, David Romero-Estévez, Diego Bolaños-Méndez, Jocelyne Alvarez-Paguay, Mónica Jadán
